name: fb-automated-tests
description: End to end tests for a Form Builder form

scripts.test:ci: rm -rf test-results && mkdir -p test-results/traces && mkdir -p test-results/har && mkdir -p test-results/screenshots && node ./node_modules/.bin/ava -v -s -- --screenshots

author: Form Builder Team <form-builder-team@digital.justice.gov.uk>
